scripts.update:bindings: ncu -u && for dir in bindings/*/; do (cd "$dir" && ncu -u); done
scripts.install:bindings: for dir in bindings/*/; do (cd "$dir" && bun install --force); done
scripts.build:bindings: for dir in bindings/*/; do (cd "$dir" && bun run build); done
scripts.bindings:all: bun run update:bindings && bun run install:bindings && bun run build:bindings
